ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "API"), not CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Admin"), Case_Number__c == null && Contact_Name__c == null && $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && ($RecordType.Name != 'GCE Support Request' && $RecordType.Name != 'GCE CSWI Support Request' && $RecordType.DeveloperName != "GCE_Account_Section_Support_Request") )
